評価.教科書Required texts0:
Reading materials are from the three following sources, which are available from the SIS Library (on the Second Floor of the G-IS Building): 
 
1. N. G. L. Hammond, A History of Greece to 322 B.C., Third Edition. This book is available at the School of International Studies Library (on the second floor of the G-IS Building), or can be purchased on Amazon. 

2. Thomas W. Africa, The Immense Majesty: A History of Rome and the Roman Empire. This book is available at the School of International Studies Library (on the second floor of the G-IS Building), or can be purchased on Amazon. 

3. Francois de Soete, “From a Kingdom of Gold to One of Iron and Rust: Political Violence and the Fall of the Roman Empire,” Kwansei Gakuin University Humanities Review 26 (2021): 87-106. This text is available at the School of International Studies Library (on the second floor of the G-IS Building), or can be viewed online at http://hdl.handle.net/10236/00030030
